text.style: stroke: none; stroke-width: 1; stroke-dasharray: none; stroke-linecap: butt; stroke-dashoffset: 0; stroke-linejoin: miter; stroke-miterlimit: 4; fill: rgb(158,0,0); fill-rule: nonzero; opacity: 1; white-space: pre;

path.style: stroke: rgb(146,0,0); stroke-width: 3; stroke-dasharray: none; stroke-linecap: butt; stroke-dashoffset: 0; stroke-linejoin: miter; stroke-miterlimit: 10; fill: none; fill-rule: evenodd; opacity: 1;
